doctext: general miguel ma ##za marquez , chief of the colombian administrative department of security ( das ) , today confirmed foreign participation in the assassination of luis carlos gala ##n , senator and liberal party presidential candidate , on 18 august in bogota . " a person of arab origin is under arrest and seems to be quite involved in the crime , " ma ##za marquez said after meeting with president virgil ##io bar ##co to discuss new measures to protect presidential candidates .
